short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chatt2.me - Audio Recording - Chrome Extension integrates audio recordings to Salesforce. Requires Chatt2.me for Salesforce

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chatt2.me - Audio Recording - Chrome Extension is a tools to works with Chatt2.me for Salesforce solution, it's only work to integrate your audio recording to Salesforce Chatt2.me, if you do not have Chatt2.me you don't need to install this extension.
